description:
These two are both 24, and both ready to have some fun...just for you!

Meet Marcus and Mason. Marcus is the stocky, muscled stud, and Mason is the slimmer, toned hunk.

It's been quite hot here on the West Coast recently, and these two were out playing in the sun. After a quick water fight the duo walks inside where they chill out with a cool glass of ice water.

Somehow the conversation goes from how hot it is to how hot it could be. Which leads into the two getting naked and doing naughty things to each other; they suck and they fuck until both of them unleash their man milk all over one another.

Enjoy these two new additions to NextDoorBuddies!
title: Marcus & Mason Wyler
